DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm stage IIIB/IV NSCLC No immediate need palliative radiotherapy No prior chemotherapy age > 20 Y/O ECOG PS : 0 2 ANC > 2000 PLT > 100k Hb > 10 total bilirubin < 2.0 mg/dL serum creatinine < 2 mg/dl SGPT SGOT < 2.5 ×ULN , alkaline phosphatase < 5 ×ULN life expectancy > 6mos .
